#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	float A,F,check;
	cin>>t;
	check=0;
	char a[t];
	for(int i=0;i<t;i++){
		cin>>a[i];
	}
	cin>>A>>F;
	for(int i=0;i<t;i++){
		if(a[i]=='L'){
			check=check-A;
			if(check<-F){
				cout<<"NO";
				return 0;
			}

		}
		if(a[i]=='R'){
			check=check+A;
			if(check>F){
				cout<<"NO";
				return 0;
			}
		}
	}
	cout<<"YES";
	return 0;
}
